ProductInfo.Features:
This DVR can connect up to 4 security cameras and enables you to comfortably take control of them.
The 4 Ch DVR Security System records high resolution videos and view them over internet.
An all-in-one security system featuring powerful network capabilities for you to monitor your home.
With a 7 inch flip-out screen, you can view videos directly without connecting it to a monitor.
The DVR security system also allows for single camera or quadrant split screen viewing.
ProductInfo.Name: Security 4 Channel H.264 DVR Security System with 7 Inch Flip-Out Screen - True all-in-one security system Tracking Tracing Tail
